name: JellyDome (Andy Graves)
description: Inspired by modern day escape rooms, the player is trapped in an underwater dome. The only way out is through a hatch to an escape pod, but the door is locked. Surrounded by inactive puzzles and colorful jellyfish swimming outside, it is up to the player to find a way to activate the puzzles and solve them in order to create the necessary items that will unlock the escape hatch door. Good luck!
